## Project: DishDash - Food Delivery App
A comprehensive React Native Expo food delivery application with features including:
- User authentication
- Restaurant browsing
- Food ordering
- Shopping cart
- Order tracking
- User profile
- Search functionality
- Favorites
- Payment integration UI
- Multiple themes
